name: CakeManage.com
overview:
We develop SIMPLE applications that help you SUCCEED in your BUSINESS.

CakeManage has developed an innovative platform that enables simple use of online management applications targeting the small businesses market.

CakeManage platform is offered with a comprehensive suite of open-source applications, integrated easily with a variety of 3rd party business SaaS.

CakeManage will offer its solution for small businesses and will partner with independent software vendors offering the solution to their small business clients.
